SEARCH

Class Transform

java.lang.Object
Transform
public class Transform extends Object
Transform Represents the Entity's xPos, yPos, rotation, and speed The transform is used to track and update the Entity's xPos, yPos, rotation, and speed
Version:
1.0
Author:
kbogott
See Also:
  • Entity
